entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3Â°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with snow at times heavy changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
